messages.id: Never log into your account through any links provided in an email.
messages.message: Never log into your account through any links provided in an email.
messages.translation: Jangan log masuk ke akaun anda melalui pelokasi sumber seragam(URL) yang diberikan dalam e-mel.

messages.id: Here is the list of usernames associated with your email:
messages.message: Here is the list of usernames associated with your email:
messages.translation: Nama pengguna yang berkaitan dengan e-mel anda:

messages.id: Hi {Username}, reset your password using the link below.
messages.message: Hi {Username}, reset your password using the link below.
messages.translation: Tetapkan semula kata laluan %[1]s melalui URL tersebut.
